title: Grab Attention MoCap Gesture Animation Pack
description: 128 MoCap animation clips based around grabbing attention and directing characters.  Motions retargeted to the UE4 mannequin.
longDescription:
Click here to view demo video


This is a set of 128 motion capture gesture animation clips themed around grabbing attention and directing people. The motions have been retargeted to the UE mannequin. They can be used in games and other projects where you need gesture motions for NPC characters or player emotes. Some of the longer sequences are suitable for use with film sequences. Where possible we have included shortened versions that are more suitable for use as player/NPC emotes and gestures.


If you have any questions please email us at contact@awesomedog.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

  128 motion capture animation clips retargeted to UE mannequin

Note: This includes variations of some animations.

For example some animations may have shorter versions for game emotes or longer versions for film sequences.


  All the animations have been looped

  Source FBX files included in Source folder for editing & import into earlier engines than 4.24

  A showcase level scene is included to help easily review the dances



Rigged to Epic skeleton: YES

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: YES

Number of Animations: 128

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Root Motion

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://awesomedog.com/unreal-mocap-pack-help
